subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Jenrry Mejia blew a save chance against the Phillies on Sunday and later said he had a hernia; the team also said Jacob deGrom would miss his next start.
snippet: The Mets’ Jenrry Mejia blew a save chance against the Phillies on Sunday and later said he had a hernia; the team also said Jacob deGrom would miss his next start.
